items.description: In v4 we used a CSS-only technique to mimic the behavior of Masonry-like columns, but this technique came with lots of unpleasant side effects. If you want to have this type of layout in v5, you can just make use of Masonry plugin. Masonry is not included in Bootstrap, but weâ€™ve made a demo example to help you get started.
items.title: Masonry
